alert.note: Alert for East Central Plains; Middle Rio Grande Valley; North Central Mountains; Northeast Plains; Northwest Highlands; Northwest Plateau; Sandia Manzano And Gallinas Mountains; West Central Highlands (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued May 30 at 2:47PM MDT until May 30 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR ALL AREAS DUE TO STRONG WINDS, LOW HUMIDITY AND AN UNSTABLE AIRMASS... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT TUESDAY FROM 1 PM MDT TO 7 PM MDT FOR THE NORTHEAST HIGHLANDS DUE TO STRONG WINDS, LOW HUMIDITY, AND AN UNSTABLE AIRMASS... .Another round of strong west winds has combined with low humidities and an unstable airmass to produce widespread critical fire weather conditions this Memorial Day. Overnight humidity recoveries were mostly poor as well. Winds turn southerly and will remain strong enough to combine with high Haines, and single-digit humidity through the northeast highlands to produce another round of critical fire weather Tuesday afternoon. A strong wind shift to the northeast and influx of cooler and more moist air will arrive once critical fire weather ends Tuesday evening. ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * AREA AND TIMING...Northwest Plateau, Northwest and West Central Highlands, Middle Rio Grande Valley, North Central and Sandia, Manzano and Gallinas Mountains, Northeast and East Central Plains until 9 PM this evening. * 20 FOOT WINDS...Southwest to west 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 45 or 50 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...Ranging from 6 to 15 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly and will be hard to control. Long range spotting and extreme fire behavior will be possible. Outdoor burning should not be done.
info.instruction: Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in the field of this Red Flag Warning.

area.areaDesc: East Central Plains; Middle Rio Grande Valley; North Central Mountains; Northeast Plains; Northwest Highlands; Northwest Plateau; Sandia Manzano And Gallinas Mountains; West Central Highlands
